title: ***Full stack developer***
content:
specializing in both **web** and **mobile development**, with expertise in the **MERN stack**, **React Native**, and **Flutter**. I’m passionate about building intuitive, high-performance applications that enhance user experiences.

In addition to development, I’m also a **blogger on Medium**, where I share insights on technology, development trends, and personal projects. Writing helps me connect with the developer community and share knowledge along the way.

As a **freelancer**, I collaborate with clients to bring their digital projects to life, offering tailored solutions that meet their business needs. Whether it's a responsive website or a mobile app, I'm dedicated to creating impactful, user-centered experiences.

---

This version now includes your blogging activity on Medium, emphasizing your role as a developer and content creator.
